movieDescription: Details: Directed: Shankar Bhanu Stars: Tejus Kancherla, Paayal Rajput, Dr V.K. Naresh, Nagineedu, Adityamenon Dialogues: Parashuram Lyrics: Bhaskar Bhatla Editor: Prawin Pudi Choreographer: Ganesh Swamy Executive Producer: Chinna D.O.P: C Ram Prasad Music: Radhan Co-Producer: C V Rao Producer: C Kalyan

movieInfo:
Directed by: Sundeep Vanga
Starring by: Vijay Deverakonda, Shalini, Sanjay Swaroop
Genres: Romance
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Arjun Reddy(Vijay Devarakonda) is a short tempered medical college student who falls in love with his junior Preeti(Shalini). The couple shares a very close relationship for years but later break up as Preeti’s dad gets her married to a boy in her caste. This leaves a very strong and brutal impression on Arjun Reddy who becomes an alcoholic and drug addict. Rest of the story showcases the journey of Arjun Reddy as to how he regains his senses and gets back to normal.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Sri Kishore
Starring by: Dhanraj, Supriya Isola, Jiiva
Genres: Horror
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Bhoo is the story of a channel crew who go to Erramala forest and stay in a building and how each of them gets killed one after the other.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Prem Chand
Starring by: Manoj Nandam, Renuka, Meka Rama krishna
Genres: Action
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Nenu Aadhi Madyalo Maa Nanna movie is a action romantic movie. Its a story of a young man, who wanted to kill a person who killed his father, how far he succeeded with his goal is the rest of movie.

movieInfo:
Directed and written by: Kalees
Starring by: Jeeva, Nikki Galrani, Anaika Soti
Genres: Crime, Thriller
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Siddharth (Jiiva) is a hacker who is blessed with a happy family life, which include his father (Rajendra Prasad) and mother (Suhasini). An unexpected incident which happen in his life leads him to another hacker (Govind Padmasoorya), who’s a monster by all means. How the good triumphs over the evil forms the rest of the story. There are several computers, mobile phones and a slew of electronic devices which the antagonist uses to manipulate innocent people’s lives

movieInfo:
Directed and written by: Sreenivas Mamilla
Starring by: Sai Srinivas Bellamkonda, Neil Nitin Mukesh, Kajal Aggarwal
Genres: Action, Romance
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Vijay(Bellamkonda Srinivas) is a sincere police officer who loves Samyukta(Kajal) and wants to marry her. But after a point of time, she disappears from the scene. This is also the time when Vijay saves a lonely girl(Mehreen) from a kidnapping. But his sincere efforts turn upside down as he gets framed in the kidnapping.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Jasmine D’Souza
Written by: Bhavani Iyer
Starring by: Tanuj Virwani, Sunny Leone, Narendra Jetley
Genres: Romance
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: The story is about Urvil Raisingh and Celina who meet at an event and a memorable night later. Returning back home they continue with their lives. The memories of Celina haunt Urvil. What happens next forms the crux of the unfolding drama. One Night Stand explores the hypocritical world we live in. What is it that Urvil wants?

movieInfo:
Directed and written by: Parthiban
Starring by: Arya, Vijay Sethupathi, Vishal, Amala Paul
Genres: Drama
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Amidst his personal struggles, Tamizh calls his friends – a DOP, a director-wannabe with 40 years of industry experience and three young Assistant directors, for a discussion to develop a script for his first film.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Sanayadi Reddy
Starring by: Deepak, Kanchi Kaul, Arjan Bajwa
Genres: Romance
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: The movie is all about friendship between innocent lovers. It depicts the extent that the two lovers go to, sacrificing their love for friendship between families of two different caste and religion.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Harinath Babu B.
Written by: Ajju Mahakali
Starring by: Sudhakar Komakula, Nithya Shetty, Nirosha
Genres: Action, Romance
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Suri(Sudhakar Komakula) is a road side romeo who falls in love with Ramya(Nithya Shetty). Due to a small issue the couple break up and Ramya heads to the US. Left with unemployment and problems, Suri luckily gets a chance to go to the US.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Shyam Prasad S
Starring by: Ali, Raghu Babu, Dhanraj
Genres: Comedy, Horror
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Rangupaduddi is a horror comedy film released 2019. Six people. One haunted bungalow. A long night of terrors. Will they succeed or succumb?

movieInfo:
Directed by: Ganesha
Starring by: Vijay Antony, Nivetha Pethuraj, Daniel Balaji
Genres: Action
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Roshagadu story is all about how a sincere and serious police officer tries to bring some good changes in the society and the people living around. In the process, he encounters a lot of problems. How did he face them and successfully try to achieve his motive forms the entire plot of the movie.

movieInfo:
Directed and written by: Suni
Starring by: Ganesh, Rashmika Mandanna, Sadhu Kokila
Genres: Comedy, Romance
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Kush, a gynaecologist and a playboy refuses his family’s wishes to marry because his freedom will be curtailed if he marries. He later marries Khushi, an innocent girl while acting as if he is also an innocent guy in front of her family.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Lanka Pratheek Prem Karan
Starring by: Mahesh Achanta, Pratheek, Shravya
Genres: Romance
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Pratheek(Pratheek Prem) is an easy going guy who goes to any extent to help his friends. When everything seems to be going fine, a girl called Sravya(Sravya) enters his life and pushes him to take up a challenge? Who is this Sravya? What is her backstory? What challenges did she force Pratheek to take up? and how does Pradeep handles these situations? That forms the rest of the story.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Albert Hughes
Written by: Daniele Sebastian Wiedenhaupt, Albert Hughes
Starring by: Kodi Smit-McPhee, Natassia Malthe, Leonor Varela
Genres: Adventure, Drama, Family
Country: USA
Language: English
movieDescription: Abandoned after his first hunt in the prehistoric Ice Age, a young man (Kodi Smit-McPhee) is left to withstand the hostile wilderness on his own. He soon encounters and befriends a deserted wolf, and the two learn what it takes to survive as a brutal winter approaches in this action-packed thriller.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Krishna Prasad
Starring by: Kamal Kamaraju, Priyanka Sharma
Genres: Horror, Thriller
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: As part of a horror reality show, 10 college students are put in a haunted house. However, as strange things occur, the audience soon realizes that it is more than being a reality show.

movieInfo:
Directed and written by: Thirumala Kishore
Starring by: Kalyani Priyadarshan, Nivetha Pethuraj, Krishna Murali Posani
Genres: Romance
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Vijay(Sai Dharam Tej) is an engineering graduate who develops an app and keeps approaching various companies. But to his bad luck, he gets rejected most of the time. Let’s with no choice, he starts working at a TV shop and falls in love with Lahari(Kalyani Priyadarshan). But things change with the entry of Shanti(Nivetha Pehturaj) as Vijay loses his love and hope in life.
